faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description:
Still have questions? Don't worry, we're here to help! Read our frequently asked questions.
If your question hasn't been addressed, simply leave it, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

auth_required.title: You need to be logged in to submit a question

faq.success_message: Your question has been successfully submitted
faq.error_message: There was a problem submitting your question

1.title: What is water-based paint?
1.answer: Water-based paint is a paint where water is the main solvent. It forms an emulsion of water and binding agent, making the paint safe and convenient to use.

2.title: Can water-based paint be used for exterior work?
2.answer: Yes, there is a special water-based paint for exterior work that has increased resistance to rain, snow, and sunlight. You can use facade paint, satin, or textured paint.

3.title: What are the main advantages of REMALUX paints?
3.answer: They dry quickly, have no odor, are easy to apply, are safe for health and the environment, and do not emit toxic substances.

4.title: What types of water-based paints are available?
4.answer: Water-based paints are available in acrylic, latex, silicone, and other polymer bases. The choice depends on operating conditions and surface requirements.

5.title: Which water-based paint should I choose for apartment walls?
5.answer: For interior work, it's better to choose PRO paint, universal paint, or interior paint, as they have good vapor permeability and are easy to clean.

6.title: Which water-based paints are better for children's rooms?
6.answer: For children's rooms, choose PRO paint, universal paint, satin, or metal and wood paint that don't contain harmful substances and don't have a strong odor.

7.title: What does 'matte' or 'glossy' surface mean?
7.answer: Matte paint doesn't reflect light, creating a velvety surface that hides imperfections (PRO paint, universal, interior). While glossy gives walls shine (satin, kitchen and bathroom paint, metal and wood paint) requires a perfectly smooth surface as it will show all imperfections.

8.title: How to properly prepare the surface before applying water-based paint?
8.answer: The surface should be clean, dry, and smooth. If necessary, remove old paint, smooth out cracks and seams, then apply primer. Humidity should not be above 80%, and temperature above +10°C.

9.title: What is the consumption of water-based paint per 1 m²?
9.answer: Usually consumption is about 100-150 ml per 1 m², depending on the surface type and chosen paint. Per one layer.

10.title: Can water-based paint be applied in multiple layers?
10.answer: Yes, for even coverage it's recommended to apply two or three layers of paint, letting each layer dry.

11.title: How long does water-based paint take to dry?
11.answer: Drying time depends on temperature and humidity, but usually paint dries from 2 hours.

12.title: Which water-based paint is most resistant to dirt?
12.answer: PRO and satin paints, facade paint, and metal and wood paint have good resistance to dirt and can be cleaned from dust and grime.

13.title: Which paint is better to choose for the bathroom?
13.answer: We have specially developed water-based paint for kitchen and bathroom with antimicrobial properties and semi-gloss finish, resistant to high humidity and mold formation.

14.title: How to properly wash walls after painting with water-based paint?
14.answer: For washing, use soft sponges and neutral cleaning agents. Harsh chemicals can damage the coating.

15.title: Which water-based paint to use for wood surfaces?
15.answer: For wood, we have water-based paints for wood and metal that have increased adhesion to wooden surfaces.

16.title: Why might water-based paint crack?
16.answer: This can be related to non-compliance with paint application technology.

17.title: Which water-based paint to choose for painting ceilings?
17.answer: Our water-based paints are perfect for painting ceilings as they dry quickly and don't emit odors. We can offer you interior paint or washable paint, or premium segment paint '2x1'.

18.title: Why is water-based paint better than oil-based paint?
18.answer: Water-based paints are easier to apply, dry faster, don't have a strong odor, and are safer for health than oil-based paints.

19.title: How to store water-based paint?
19.answer: Store paint in a tightly closed container in a dry and cool place at a temperature from +5°C to +35°C, away from heat sources and direct sunlight.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.welcome_text: Welcome to the Remalux partnership page. Here you will find information about cooperation opportunities with us and the benefits our partners receive.
partnership.history_text: Over more than 30 years, we have grown from a small production facility to one of the leaders in the paint and coating materials market in Kazakhstan.

history.1990: Company foundation and start of first paint and coating materials production
history.1995: Product range expansion and entry into regional markets
history.2000: Production modernization and implementation of new technologies
history.2010: Opening of new production lines and distribution network expansion
history.2015: Launch of innovative products and entry into international market
history.2023: Implementation of AR technologies and mobile app launch

branches.title: Branches and Representative Offices
branches.description: Our company has a wide network of branches and representative offices throughout Kazakhstan, allowing us to be closer to our clients and partners.

partnership.why_choose_us_desc: We offer our partners unique cooperation terms and support at all stages of work.

advantages.high_quality_desc: Products comply with international quality standards
advantages.materials_desc: Wide selection of materials for any task

news.title: Stay Up to Date with All News
news.description: Want to be the first to know about new products, promotions, and inspiring projects? Follow us on Instagram! Keep track of updates, find ideas for your projects, and stay informed about all Remalux news. Join our online family and become part of the world of vibrant colors and creative solutions!

application.title: Fill Out Partnership Application Form
application.description: Want to become a Remalux partner and offer our customers the best paints? Fill out the application, and our manager will contact you to discuss cooperation terms and answer all your questions.

about.title: About Company
about.company_description: K-COLOR LLP with REMALUX trademark is a leader in the production of paint and varnish materials in the Republic of Kazakhstan. We offer our customers a wide range of high-quality paints made according to British formulations, comparable to the most popular French, Belgian, German, Dutch and Turkish manufacturers.

quality.title: High Quality
quality.description: Our paints undergo strict quality control, ensuring high coverage quality and durability

price.title: Competitive Prices
price.description: We optimize prices so you can get professional products at affordable prices

technology.title: Innovative Production Technologies
technology.description: We use new technologies to ensure our products dry quickly and provide rich color

service.title: Professional Service
service.description: Our specialists are always ready to help with product selection and provide technical advice

materials.title: Economical Material Consumption
materials.description: Our paints have such density that you can reduce consumption and save on painting

assortment.title: Wide Product Range
assortment.description: Our range includes paints for any need - from interior paint to industrial coatings and decorative plasters

for_whom.title: Who are our company's products for?
for_whom.description: The products we manufacture are designed to easily meet the requirements of the most demanding highly qualified professionals for use in prestigious facilities. In addition, it is perfectly suitable for ordinary people who choose materials for home use and independent cosmetic repairs.

info_section.title: Everything you need for a perfect result
info_section.description: REMALUX produces high-quality paint and varnish materials with modern technologies and excellent service. All products are safe and comply with European standards.

technology.title: Innovative Technologies and Modern Production Methods
technology.description: REMALUX paint and varnish materials production is based on modern technologies and world science achievements, allowing us to produce high-quality and safe products at competitive prices.

service.title: Service Support
service.description: We provide long-term and post-warranty service, training center consultations, and technical support. Our specialists are always ready to serve.

assortment.title: Wide Product Range
assortment.description: REMALUX produces paste-like plasters, water-emulsion paints, varnishes, acrylic adhesives, and other materials. We select paint for any task from interior paint to industrial coatings and decorative plasters.

safety.title: Safety and Comfort of Use
safety.description: REMALUX company products are safe to use, odorless, allowing comfortable application of materials. Our paints dry quickly and don't require special application methods.

car_fleet.title: Our Car Fleet: Fast and Reliable Delivery
car_fleet.description: We have a modern car fleet that enables prompt and reliable delivery of our products throughout Kazakhstan. Our professional drivers and logistics specialists ensure timely delivery of orders to any point in the country, guaranteeing the safety of products during transportation.
